pages.title: Magic Condensation
pages.text: Now that you have obtained the $(l:spell_category/essence_extraction)Magic Mushrooms' essences$(), it's time to $(l)condense$() them into other objects, creating new magical artifacts and tools. First things first, you'll need some $(l)Essences$(), $(l)Nether Stars$() and a $(l)Magic Condenser$():

Magic condensation takes a little while to be complete, so it might be better to do something else instead of waiting. If you're having issues using a Magic Condenser, check the following pages for instructions.

pages.title: Condensing Interface
pages.text: Check the following page for usage instructions.

$(c)$(l)1. Condensation Slot$() Where you place the object you want to condense essences into.$(br2)$(c)$(l)2. Essence Slot & Gauges$() Where you'll insert the essences required for your condensation. Don't worry if you add a essence that isn't used; only the required essences will be consumed.$(br2)$(c)$(l)3. NSP Slot$() Where $(l)Nether Stars$() are inserted to generate $(l)Nether Star Power (NSP)$(), used to perform most kinds of condensation.
